modName: Hectrol FX RAINDROPS Deluxe HR for Natural Skyrim Rain
summary:
VIDEO: http://youtu.be/HzRni-2UrIw

* ATTENTION - This texture pack requires \"Natural Skyrim Rain\" by Nopheros [http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8395] be installed. *

This texture set recreates a realistic and beautiful rain, adding new graphics with more resolution, detail and an iridescent effect to the spectacular \"Skyrim Natural Rain\"
descriptionHtml:
http://hectrol.deviantart.com/gallery/

http://hectrolportafolio.blogspot.com.es/

* Write \"hectrol\" in the search box of Nexusnetwork to find all my mods for all games.\\m/ *

[img]http://www.luna-s-art.com/nexusnetwork/Hectrol_FX_RAINDROPS_Deluxe_HR_for_Natural_Skyrim_Rain_925.jpg[/img]


VIDEO: http://youtu.be/HzRni-2UrIw


DESCRIPTION:

* ATTENTION - This texture pack requires \"Natural Skyrim Rain\" by Nopheros [http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8395] be installed. *


This texture set recreates a realistic and beautiful rain, adding new graphics with more resolution, detail and an iridescent effect to the spectacular \"Skyrim Natural Rain\" by Nopheros.

These sharp raindrops are designed to be spectacular in bullet time.

- A completely new HighRes textures.
- Texture size is increased to 4096x4096
- Pseudo iridescence effect.

VIDEO: http://youtu.be/HzRni-2UrIw


Modified files:

-fxraindrops.dds
-fxheavyrainmist.dds
-fxlightrainmist.dds


INSTALATION:

Use FOMM or Nexus Mod Manager.


OTHER MODS FOR SKYRIM:
